thread.title: ChinaJoy 2015: Strict dress code for models at Shanghai expo 'a blessing'
thread.title_full: ChinaJoy 2015: Strict dress code for models at Shanghai expo 'a blessing' - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: ChinaJoy 2015: Strict dress code for models at Shanghai expo 'a blessing'
text: More news, analysis and features at China Watch Models pose at ChinaJoy 2015 in Shanghai on July 30. Organisers of the four-day digital entertainment expo this year imposed strict limits on models’ outfits, banning clothing deemed too revealing. Model Zhao Yue, 21, has worked the event for several years and supported the move: “The rules are a real blessing. "Overly revealing costumes did us no good. Some men came just to look at our bodies, rather than at the video games.” This story was originally produced and published by China Daily . • Read more about Chinese current affairs at China Watch
